item.title: Portfolio Update - May 2021
item.description: Portfolio value: CA$805,673 Below is the portfolio’s performance YTD (time-weighted cumulative return). The month’s performances assume cashflows occured mid-month. USD holdings are excluded but quite small at the moment. The positions as of May 31st 2021 are as follows: XX.V and AEP.V are new additions. They are both roll-ups in a boring industry. The stocks are cheap. NUR.V has been a drag. In hindsight, it was an over-sized and ill-timed bet.
